article_title: Obama appoints Lt. Gov. Jerry Abramson to White House post; Crit Luallen named as replacement
article_text: Lt. Gov. Jerry Abramson is leaving the state Capitol for a job in the White House and former Auditor Crit Luallen will take his place as Kentucky's No. 2 public official.
